items.title: New Haven Hobby Fair
items.location: New Haven Pride Center, 50 Orange Street
items.summary: New Year, New Hobby, New Haven — a community hobby fair featuring groups like Mahjong Haven, Hotties Hiking Club, New Haven Pottery Studio, CT Roller Derby, and more.

items.title: Freedom Songs (MLK Day)
items.summary: A daylong exploration of music and the civil rights movement — a communal listening experience honoring Dr. King’s legacy through the songs that sustained the movement.
